title: Invoicey
description: A comprehensive invoice management application built with modern web technologies. Features include invoice generation, client management, payment tracking, and automated reminders.
longDescription: Invoicey is a full-featured invoice management system designed for freelancers and small businesses. The application provides a clean, intuitive interface for creating professional invoices, managing client relationships, and tracking payments. Built with performance and scalability in mind.

title: Netflix-GPT
description: A Netflix clone enhanced with GPT-3 powered movie recommendations. Users can search for movies using natural language and get AI-powered suggestions based on their preferences.
longDescription: Netflix-GPT combines the familiar Netflix interface with the power of OpenAI's GPT-3 to create an intelligent movie discovery platform. The application features natural language search, personalized recommendations, and a responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices.
